title: Arcade EDM - Volume 1
description: 10 electronic themes for fast pace arcades, delivering all the energy you need with multiple loops and shorter edits
longDescription:
Preview the collection:

  • YouTube


"Arcade EDM - Volume 1" features many styles of upbeat electronic music suitable for any type of arcade, shooter, platform and rhythm game. 10 full length uplifting music themes with multiple loops and shorter edits for further usage.


  • Upbeat Electronic Kalimba: Full length (02:59), 1 Short edit, 15 Loops 
  • EDM Cinematic Stomps: Full length (02:33), 3 Short edits, 12 Loops
  • Corporate Deep EDM: Full length (02:16), 1 Short edit, 8 Loops
  • Arcade Upbeat Sci-Fi: Full length (02:06), 1 Short edit, 10 Loops
  • Game Of Tronic: Full length (04:00), 1 Short edit, 23 Loops
  • Happy Sports: Full Length (01:02), 2 Short edits, 5 Loops
  • Shoot'em'all Under Trance: Full length (02:28), 2 Short edits, 13 Loops
  • Success And Motivation: Full length (02:52), 3 Short edits, 12 Loops
  • Arcade Upbeat EDM Rock: Full length (03:32), 1 Short edit, 8 Loops
  • Energetic Social Upbeat: Full length (02:01), 3 Short edits, 9 Loops


Take a look: Total Game Music Collection - 500 High Quality music themes ideal for any game!

Maybe you might be interested at Arcade EDM - Volume 2 or High Speed EDM - Volume 1


This pack is produced by Luca Tomassini a composer with more than 20 years of expertise in music production with multiple TV, feature films and multimedia placements.
technicalDetails:
Features:

  • 10 Full length
  • 18 Shorter edits
  • 114 Loops

Number of Audio Wavs: 142

Number of Audio Cues: 142

Sample Rate/Bit Rate: 44.1 kHz, 16bit Stereo WAVs

Does Music Loop: Yes

Minutes of Audio provided: 101:09

Supported Development Platforms: All

Supported Target Build Platforms: All


- Terms of Usage and Licensing Notes outside the game engine.

All packages by Frequently Asked Music are meant to be used within Unreal Engine. Please contact us at studio@frequentlyaskedmusic.com for further clearance in case you want to use a specific track for other purposes - YouTube videos, social marketing, promo.
